title: MT Thunder 3

product_details.description: A highly popular commuter helmet in India offering aggressive styling, great ventilation, and standard safety certifications at an entry-level price.

analysis: A staple in the Asian market, the MT Thunder 3 provides substantial value. Featuring an internal drop-down sun visor and a robust polycarbonate shell engineered for urban impacts, it successfully balances utility, affordability, and critical impact homologation standards.
